inclusion.criterion: Presentation to either APC Clinic or IPM Clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Child participant is 8-17 years of age
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Child unable to see computer screen or interact with the keyboard or mouse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Parent/child unable or unwilling to provide permission/assent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
